content.detailedDescription:
On the way to newark airport in limo, the last day of june, 1:20 p.M., was looking at sky since i always keep a lookout on the turnpike (famous sighting at carteret in 2001 , may be repeated, i thought)  saw object one half size of thumbnail at arm's length, dark gray, tortoise shell shaped, 45 degrees from horizon, no movement. i thought it might be plane (near airport), but no wings visible and i watched to see if it was advancing or retreating (changing in size) or if it would catch the sun (shiny like plane) or turn to reveal wings.  it remained gray, same size, no wings.  i was on turnpike, thus kept losing object as the car turned, but reacquired it each time.  it was still there when i unloaded my luggage at airport, and was seen by limo driver as well.  i did not see it disappear, but saw driver still watching it as i went into airport.

no tether (clear line to horizon visible), at about 45 degrees.  not shiny like aircraft departing and arriving at airport.  no wings.  saw from several different angles as car's position kept changing.  size did not vary.

not an airplane, nor a balloon (no movement on breezy day)...Could possibly have been a blimp, but no writing or movement. i only lost sight when i entered the terminal to catch plane.  i was intrigued, but not afraid...I am convinced that any visitors we are having are not belligerent, or we would have known by now.
content.summary: Hovered at 45 degrees for fifteen or more minutes, near newark air port

content.detailedDescription:
Today, on sunday, august 3, 2008 at 11:30 am, my son was driving my car and i was the passenger on our way to dropping him off at work.  i was admiring how blue and clear the sky was, thinking about how hot the weather would be today and if i could see any clouds in the sky anywhere.  there were only high thin clouds in the very far south of the sky.  i saw an object that i at first thought may be a small singular flat cloud in the southwest, but as i stared at it, i then thought it was a commercial aircraft as it looked silvery metalic with the sun slightly reflecting off the top of it, but it was at a great distance and height in the sky. i saw the object straight out the front windshield of the car. we were facing southwest and were about to approach the turn in to the parking lot.  i spoke outloud, "what is that thing?". my son inquired as to where i was looking as we were approaching the parking lot entrance.  he looked where i was pointing and saw it briefly and said he thought it was an airplane, but he only got to look for about 5 or 6 seconds.  as we were making the right turn, i said "but it isn't moving" and crouched down in the car to see up and out the left windows.  he tried to look at it with me out the left side window, and he said he could still see it as we drove very slow into the parking lot. but i instructed him to pull in to a parking spot out in the open because there were many people around and he is just learning to drive.  i then looked away to instruct him where to park so that we would have a clear view of that area of sky away from trees.  we parked and quickly stepped out of the car, searching the same area of sky, but the object was gone. i looked and instructed my son to look, in the surrounding area of the sky as if it were a jet and had traveled in the several seconds that we were parking the car. after approximately 30 seconds of searching in the sky and finding nothing, my son walked in to work and i got in to my car and looked at the clock to see it was 11:34am.  heading back home, i pulled in to a school parking lot on a small hill a few blocks away from where i left my son. i sat and looked around the southern and western skies for about 5 minutes. i couldn't find anything in the south or west, not even any commercial aircraft.  as i type this, i now find it odd that i didn't see any commercial aircraft either.

i have been trying to run through my mind what other possiblities it could be, but nothing else makes sense.  i sincerely feel that is was not an aircraft such as a commercial passenger jet that we frequently see as we are approximately 10 miles from dfw airport. this object was stationary. i truely believe there would have been obvious movement across the sky, and how close it would have to be for even the largest commercial jet airplane to be that length. besides, the length to thickness ratio was not proportionate to any of the commercial aircraft that i have seen. this was cigar shaped from our angle, or possibly some other flat shape and we were just viewing along its edge.  the lack of clarity of the metalic surface, even though it did appear like the silver skin of a commercial jet, makes me believe it was very far away, making it very, very large in size. i thought about the possiblity that it was a reflection of some sort inside the car onto the inside windshield, however, i continued to see the object in the same spot in the sky as we were turning. 

i do have a great interest in ufo phenonenom. i have only had one other sighting experience about 5 years ago, but i have never submitted any kind of report before.  this particular experience left such a feeling that i know i saw something that didn't make sense.  i felt i had to report this, and hope that others saw what i did and will report it as well.

thank you
content.summary: White cigar shaped, silvery metalic, sun reflective topside; stationary.  very high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
at about 9h45pm, one of my cats was laying near the window that faces west, i got up from the coutch and with the ideia of playing with the cat, as i got near the windows, a bright orange light caught my attention. it was over the ocean and it was very bright and big. at first i thought it looked like a meteor fireball, but unlike these, it wasn't moving. since i'm an amateur astronomeur and a aviation ethusiast i knew that the object was something else, i called my wife who also saw the object.
 i stood there a few seconds looking at it, then grabed the binocolous and run outside the house, as i got out the light wasen't there anymore, and apparently nothing was in it last known position, i called for my wife asking if she still had visual contact and she told me that in a few seconds that she looked away the object disapeared.
 then, from the object's previous location a small and bright white light came on, and it was moving, i looked at it for several minutes until it came near enough for an identification. the white light i saw was actually the landing lights of an aircraft, but even as it crossed the sky and it got near me it's light and size wasn't comparable to the orange sphere.
 my guess, that aircraft and some interaction with the object and only a few seconds after the object went away it was able to turn it's lights. notice that although aircraft usually pass by the path of yesterday's aircraft, i never saw one turn it's lights before, and for a few seconds, it had no lights on.
 as for my fellings during the event, as soon as excluded that the orange sphere was something natural or man made, i just wish it got near so i could shoot it with my shotgun.
content.summary: Interaction with aircraft

content.detailedDescription: 1 was on my way home from delivering a customers repaired car in margate 15 miles from my workplace in deal kent.As i drove along the histreet in st peters,i noticed a cigar shaped object in the sky.It was massive in size,was a burning orange whith a smoke trail in the middle.It was comming down to the ground very slowly.I then lost sight of the object as it dissapeared behind a row of houses in the distance.
content.summary: I saw a bright burning orange cigar shape with smoke trail from my car winshield.

content.detailedDescription:
One evening during the middle of the summer me and my ex wife drove to the outskirts of abilene and was sitting in the back of our pick up truck looking for falling stars. it was about 2:am and there was a full moon so the sky and surroundings were lit up like daytime. it wasn���t the best situation for viewing a meteor shower but we had nothing better to do at the time. and although we didnt see any falling stars we did see something else that has been etched in my mind ever since and something that i think about quite often.

we found a dirt road that was just off of the main highway. we were several miles outside of town and there was another man there with his two kids, they were parked maybe 100-200 feet away from us and i can.Remember being able to see everything they were doing as if it was the middle of the day. they had a big telescope setup in the back of there pickup truck and apparently had the same idea that we did.

although it was very bright out because of the moon, the horizon was black except for the glow coming from a town that was maybe 10-20 miles away. i remember looking at the sky in the direction of the town when i noticed the entire horizon started to slowly turn pitch black, even blacker than before. i remember thinking to myself why are the lights from the town disappearing from the ground up. the ���blackness��� kept getting larger (taller) and eventually completely blocked out the glow of the town in the distance. i remember asking my wife several times "what is it". i thought that it might have been a storm front moving in. i remember looking around the sky for other clouds and there wasn���t s single cloud in the sky. the sky was so bright that i could have seen a small bird flying hundreds of feet over my head. after 5 minutes or so i could see the lights from the town starting to appear again from the ground up. i could also still see what now looked like a black band stretching all the way across the sky. 

i stood there staring at this band as it moved towards us for at least 20 minutes, the closer it got the larger it appeared, and eventually it moved directly over us. when it "rolled" or gently "glided" overtop of us it was a perfect cylinder shape that stretched all the way across the sky to my left and to my right. the one thing that keeps popping into my head two decades later is that i remember saying to my wife even as this thing was right over top of us is "what is it". i could clearly see it, it directly overhead but i could figure out what i was looking it.

when directly overhead the color appeared to be a dark gray color. it has no markings, lights, sounds or anything that suggested that it was "man" made other than the perfect shape and uniformity of this thing which instantly convinced me that it was not a naturally occurring object.  i also remember thinking that it has a "soft" appearance to it, maybe because it was tubular in shape and lighter than the black background of the sky. it gave me the impression of a pipe gently rolling across a perfectly smooth surface as it moved across the sky.

ive only told some close family members about it and ive always told them that if this thing was 1000 feet over my head that it would have to had been 200 feet in circumference, and so long that i couldnt see the ends of it, and if it was much higher than that, then the size would have been even larger.

well that���s my story. it is true and i just wish that i could not only convey what i saw but also share the feelings that were/are connected to the experience. i can say with 100% certainty that what i saw was not a naturally occurring phenomena or even remotely similar to anything that ive ever seen before or since.  but what i cant say with any certainty is whether or not it was military related
content.summary: I witnessed a very large tubular or cylindrical shaped object that stretched across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
2 adults and one child in our back yard enjoying a fire and looking at the night sky. we spotted a very bright light, a starburst shape, that was high in the sky and moving in a se direction. it was very bright at first. it was moving slowly in an erratic type motion, almost wobbling as it headed se. we commented that is was definitely not an airplane or a meteor. it started to fade, then was just a spot of light. it turned red and then disappeared. at the same time we saw a meteor shoot across the sky, so it was markedly different than the meteor. the whole event lasted about 30 seconds.

we knew we had seen something remarkable and different than we had ever seen.
content.summary: Very bright wobbly starburst shape moving se

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my back porch on august 1st 2008 at 11:45pm , moonless night, clear skies the stars were very clear. for about 10 minutes i was looking in these general area's while facing west; big dipper, orion's belt then i was looking a very bright band of the milky way right above me. this is when i observed the 4 objects moving from east to west in a tight formation, they seemed to be moving at very high speed although i couldn't begin to estimate their size or altitude. my first thoughts were military jets, after the first couple seconds i realized they weren't jets at all.  the objects were crescent shaped with a 3rd point in the middle of the crescent, all 3 point trailing(like a waning moon)as they headed west. the total time the objects were observed was no more than 5 seconds. there was a silver grey glow around them, there was a odd humming sound as they past overhead. i lost sight of the objects as they past behind behind a large tree west of my position

i was quite emotional directly after the sighting, i got my head around what i had just seen, i stood on the porch for another 5 minutes looking for more, i then went inside to tell my wife what had happened.
content.summary: 4 objects- modified crescent shape -east to west- high speed only discrenable sound was a hum

content.detailedDescription: This event happened during the summer of 2006 while on vacation in cape cod.  although the object is fuzzy, i believe it looks identical to the one submitted by the person working in afghanistan on 4/4/08, and because of that felt compelled to post my picture.  as in other cases, i had no knowledge of the object until the pictures were downloaded to my computer.  other shots taken immediately before and after did not contain the object.  if you look closely, the object is just right of center in the sky.  i am also attaching an enlarged view.
content.summary: Only saw object after downloading pics to computer

content.detailedDescription: We were approaching the bridge from the kingston area to rhinebeck to go home after shopping in kingston and noticed all of the lights at the airport next to the bridge were on and flashing.  then we noticed a bright light in the sky above the bridge.  first we thought it was an incoming plane until we realized it was not moving but just hovering at the top of the bridge.  at this point we assumed it was a helicopter.  we found out soon it was not.  as we approached the object we listened for noise but there was none.  we noticed that it was also glowing red, blue and yellow as well as the bright white light.  when we arrived underneath the object my husband and son looked directly above us at it.  it was round and slowly rotating as well as hovering in one spot with no noise.  as we passed we looked behind to see it shoot very very quickly about 1/2 mile south and then dead stop.  it was so fast my son said it left a color trail from the lights.  i then saw it take off again very very fast again towards the south directly down the hudson river and out of our sight.  we were on a bridge and unable to stop or we would have stopped and investigated further.  by the time we got to the other side of the bridge and able to turn around it was gone.  this is something i never thought in a million years we would ever see.  we know what we saw and it was not anything we can explain.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was seen hovering and rotating above center of kingston rhinecliff bridge at 9:25 pm

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north on cottonwood road after sunset with my friend his mother and aunt, we noticed a "star" in the eastern sky. it caught our attention because of it's singularity, color, size, and apparent motion. at first we all thought planet mars because of the dull orange/red color, but the size was larger and it seemed to be rising from the horizon. we slowed and pulled over to watch. as it approached slowly at a high altitude two other white lights became visible on either side of the orb. then we thought aircraft, but there was no blinking lights. as it passed over, a third white light was visible to the front of the dim glowing sphere and the two other lights more to the rear all three in a triangle shape. we had no explanation and continued to our destination.   later that evening while driving south on 397 we noticed another similar light it the western sky. once again we pulled over but this time we got out of the vehicle. it appeared the same way but at a much lower altitude. there was no moon and the sky was clear. as the object passed over, slower than a fixed wing aircraft, it blacked out the stars behind it and made a sound unfamiliar to any of us. we expected to see a reflection of city lights on it as it went east over harrison, but there was none. the tree line obscured it and it was gone.
content.summary: First seen in eastern sky going west, later seen in western sky going east.

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 10:00 pm...Last night...08/01/2008...I happened to look north (i am usually looking south), and
i saw two orbs last night...1 heading southeast...It was the 2nd largest and brightest
i have seen yet...Of course...I didn't have my camera with me...Ran inside....
got it...But it was too late. 
it was low altitude...Moving slower...And silent again.
then...I saw another one...Heading due north only 5 seconds later.  it was at a very high alt.
it hesitated as i explained before....And took off at an incredible rate...Lighting up the sky around it.
it remains consistent here in illinois....I want people to see these thing...They are amazing.
content.summary: Huge white orb...Heading southeast

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1974 while  a friend and i were outside my house in my front yard on fort bliss, we noticed a green/blue oval that was way above the mountians. it was comeing from the direction of white sands nm, i know this because i had gone with my father to white sands missle range many times as he was an e7 sargent in the army "aircraft mechanic and teacher". the object was flying very eratic, not in direction but speed, from extremly fast to almst a stand still. i was 13 years old a the time and had been on army bases all my life and going to the airplane hangers and seeing just about everything that flew at that time i knew it was not a plane or helicopter. up to the point of seeing the object that night my past experiance with being around aircraft was pretty extensive, i saw the first concord sst being tested for cold weather in fairbanks alaska , my father was stationed at fort waynewrite at the time to going out to white sands nm watching what ever he was working on, i whitnesd drone planes towed by an airplane being shot down with some type of lasser light emited from a large flate panel that looked like a solar panel mouted on an apc.
i saw the green/blue object a least 4 times after the first time and then something very odd happened a few weeks "aprox" latter, i heard my father talking to a man in his company "fellow inlisted man" on our carport about having to pull guard duty at a hanger on base, he didn't sound mad but he did sound reluctant about the duty. i was listining to them because my father was his boss and my bedroom window faced the carport. my father was a very abusive father and had a very bad temper so naturaly when i saw him talking to that man i got scared. fort bliss had seemed to be more uptight or uneasy over the next few weeks for some reason, the guards at the gates looked and checked everyone just a little harder, i know this not only from comeing and going from the bass but i live a half block from the north gate and used to watch the guards. i asked my dad much to my insecurity about what was going on around the base and much to my surprise he told me there was something being guarded in a hanger on base that no one was aloud to talk about, he did say it was on what i knew at the time as a tank hauler truck. he never taled about it again, we got transfered 3 mounths latter, the last month he put me on restriction for something  did and i could not go anywhere until we moved. he was in the army 21 years, his last mos was in our home town, tampa fl. , he worked out on mcdill airforce base. i am now 47 years old and my health is not good due to carbon monoxide poisoning,i as my father wasa mechanic. i wanted to tell my story just incase i'm not around much longer. i would like to add that during my adult life i have always been fasinated with military aircraft, theoligy, how everything and anything works, i have studied for years and years about aircraft and if i dont know about something i find out. i consider myself a knowledgeble , logical and enquiering person. my grandfather was a babtist preacher so my knowledge of religion is deep and yet i still have this want and passtion about the univerce and the strong feeling that we can't be all there is. something did happen in 1974 on fort bliss, i just don't know what. i have watched every show, documentary on ufo's , i am even a mufon member and yet i never told anyone about fort bliss and what i saw and heard but in hindsite my fathers stint in the army and his scary , eratic abusive behavior just don't add up. my father was in viet nam in hue during the tet offensive, he was working alongside the cia with the ov-1 mohawk testing the flear radar, to what extent i dont know. i apologias for my miss spelling and jumping around, its just for so any years i have tried to connect the dot's.  
sincerely, robert e lane
content.summary: My friend and i saw a green - blue oblong oval over fort bliss- el paso area

content.detailedDescription: Radio head just finished their set at lollapalooza downtown chicago....My wife,daughter, and myself were waiting in line for the washroom. i was looking up just waiting and all of a sudden a bright white object appeared...East over lake michigan...I thought nothing of it there were helicopters every where...Then it started moving south...Southwest in rapid speed....About the speed of a fighter jet...Without a sound....And i told my wife to look she looked up and saw it speed into a cloud and disappear...Amazingly...No one else saw this thing....It was small bright white...And extremely fast
content.summary: Small round...Bright white....

content.detailedDescription:
My niece was looking at her address on goggle map, street view and looked in the sky and said there was a flying saucer over her house-north west location.

address is not hers , just a reference address
date,time & duration is today's info, photo is not dated.

goggle map-street view: 24222 new york dearborn mi- north west sky location
http://maps.Google.Com/maps?Ie=utf-8&hl=en&tab=wl

there is a airport & fight path in the area,
it is a sunny, bright day with a lot of glare & shinning in the photos that day.

what makes it strange is: 
the shape of the object
when you look from different streets
(notre dame st-nw - different distance)  
(boston st.-west & smaller))
still staying in the same general direction.
shape stays the same.
when you search for it again a few more streets away (time) it is gone.

i believe if it was was something on the liens, it would show up in different locations directions.

there is probably a simple cause of this effect, i do not know what to tell her and just in case there is not a simple answer, it could be worth looking into.

please keep me updated,

thank you
content.summary: Goggle map-street view: 24222 new york dearborn mi- north west sky location

content.detailedDescription:
From my back garden i saw a slow moving silvery object in the sky, a reasonable distance away. from the speed, i thought i'd had time to get some binoculars before it went behind cloud. by the time i got back it was gone. i can definitely say that it was not a plane/helicopter/bird.

it may have been a balloon of some sort but i cannot be sure, which is why i was going for my binoculars.
content.summary: Slow moving silvery object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the grocery store ne when i noticed two large lights in the sky.  i noticed that one of the lights was not moving at all and the other was moving in next to the other light as i came closer to the lights i noticed the light that was moving had a blinking red light.  i rolled my window down and was going 40 miles an hour as i drove underneath the object i saw they both was triangled shape with two lights on each side and one on the tip not bright white lights but the color you would see in low voltage landscaping lights in amber (they was approx 500 ft above me) i could see that they was triangled shape (dark silver in color) i watched as the moving aircraft landed ontop of the one that was not moving.  i had my xm radio on ( in an area i travel twice a day everyday and have never lost my signal)i lost my signal.  i turned my vehicle around to get pulled off so i could get a pic on my cellphone and i watched as the connected aircraft flew off to the west and from behind it looked like a bomber jet.  i was not able to get a picture because it flew off at a high rate of speed.  i first thought that it might have been some type of military aircraft that needed refueling but i have never seen a triangled shaped aircraft that could come to a complete stop and i don't think that they would refuel by landing ontop of one another.  i was totally in awe of what i saw and also scared to death.  i hope that maybe someone else in or around the sw area of va maybe saw something similar.  i also saw on aug. 2, 2008 around 12:30 am a bright light moving at a high rate of speed and a flashing red/white light chasing it.  we had several friend over that witnessed this along with myself and my husband.  my husband said he thought it was one very large object, i think it was 2 possibly ufo/military.
content.summary: Two triangled objects

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted a silver glint in the western sky, appeared to be a disk like object, perhaps more oval traveling very consistently at a slow pace, maybe about as fast as a slow traveling plane. it didn't appear to be extremely high, but it was a good distance away.  approx size is comparable to the size of a small sunflower seed. i thought maybe it could be a plane, but couldn't see any wings span off it during its travel across the sky. (usually the sun will glint off of them at some point, or the angle will change so they are visible)at one point the sun reflected off it very brightly, for about 3 or so seconds. it traveled in a north to south direction. we also have an airport in that that area(sw regional), which is why i am kinda hesitant to say its a ufo. only reason i am reporting this, is due to the fact i couldn't detect any wing span at any point across the sky. i do not jump to the ufo conclusion easily. i believe they are out there, but i also believe that they are often mistaken and are generally our own planes and the like. 

the sky was a typical florida sky, clear, blue and bright. i am 37 yrs old single parent of two with a college degree in medical admin. my view was not blocked during the travel across the sky except for a moment by a light pole. i turned away once it had gotten far off in the distance and couldn't see more than a spec. pointed it out to my son, who also didnt see the wings. 

no odd behavior or feelings.
content.summary: Silver disk, or oval shaped object flying steadily across skyin a south dir

content.detailedDescription:
I work for the u.S. government in kandahar, afghanistan.  i have been here for the last two years (nato air base).  prior to working here in afghanistan i worked at the air logistics center in oklahoma city for 10 years.  i have an extensive background in military/civil aviation and have seen just about every imaginable military aircraft fly in and out of this nato base.

in april of this year i took some photos of a project area located adjacent to the nato base.  when i returned and viewed the photos i noticed an object in the upper left part of the scene. when i took the photo there were no aircraft flying in the area, and i did not see the object at the time the photo was taken. 

like most photos of unidentified objects, this one is quite blurry.  however, when you zoom in on the object it is clear that it is disc shaped.  i have never seen an aircraft like this before.  i examined the other photos i took just seconds after the one with the object and nothing was there.  what ever the object, it must have been moving at a high rate of speed.


i had to reduce the size of the photo for attachment.  for full size photo, please provide a contact e-mail.
content.summary: Object captured when taking photo at project site.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving north on lacholla road in tucson about 9:55 p.M. on tuesday, july 29, 2008 and as i was approaching magee road i observed two very bright orbs in the northwest sky that were moving very slowly. the lights stayed the same distance apart from each other. one light appeared to be red and the other one a pale green but they were not blinking like airplanes or helicopters do. i first thought they were stars but they were too large and had a definite color to them and i thought it was strange the way they were aligned to each other. i thought i possibly saw a third light but it appeared too faint. the two orbs stood out very distinctly in the sky. i was very curious and wanted to oberve them longer but since i was drving it was necessary to keep my eyes on the road.  i thought about pulling off to the side of the road but that made me feel slightly anxious. i looked back a few times and could still see them but couldn't see them any longer as i approached my house.I went back at the same time on the next two nights thinking i might be able to see the same thing but saw nothing unusual. my experience reminded me of the report from oregon on july 29, 2008 but i didn't see a time of that person's sighting.
content.summary: I saw two very bright orbs in the northwest sky, one appeared a pale red and the other one above it had a green cast

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of  8/1/08. my sister, nephew, mother and i where walking the dog at brooklyn prospect park at around 10:00 pm. i pointed out that i had been watching the sky for about two years with my little $100.00 telescope and i had never seen so many triangle constellations. every where we looked in the sky we saw stars. to me this was very strange because i have a very hard time even finding stars in the light polluted sky of new york city. 
then my mother said " i think the stars are moving"  every one laughed out loud and thought she was crazy! ... but then my sister said " dude...I think that one just moved"! we all stopped walking and started to look at the one star both my mother and sister saw move.
we could not believe what we were seeing! lots of "stars" moving in very strange ways. it seemed to be as if they were on a tether and were being moved by the wind, "but how could this be, they are stars" my mother said. we left the park at 12:20 am. the lights were still there when we left.
this is the first time i have ever seen something like this. 
did any one else report seeing these "stars" moving in nyc.
content.summary: Bright lights in the night sky that looked like stars but moved! in strange ways!

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog outside when i noticed a flash in the sky. we were moving up the street. 

i knew right away it wasn't anything man-made, such as a plane, helicoptor, blimp, etc. 

it gave off a silver flash of light before it flew into the clouds a second later. it looked like a miniature silver sun.
content.summary: Extremely & entirely quiet. gave off silver flash and flew. moved quick.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when i saw a flash in the sky. it was completely silent, so i noticed it wasn't anything man-made, such as a plane, helicopter, blimp, etc. i looked up quickly to see a star-like object give a flash of silver light so bright, i thought it was almost a miniature sun. it flew off into the clouds a second later and i couldn't find it.
content.summary: Entirely quiet. gave off silver flash and flew.

content.detailedDescription: I heard the sound of a jet engine while sitting in my living room. there's alot of military refuel flights pass over in the evening so i was hope to catch a look at one, cause it sounded really low, lower than usual.  so i walked out onto my porch and seen the plane, object, what ever. it sounded like a jet, but it didn't look like any kind of aircraft i had ever seen. it was big, but the lights were really strange. no lights on the wings or tail just eight lights, two on each corner and a red strobe type light in the middle. does anyone know if this could be some experemental jet?
content.summary: Square looking w/ 2 sets of white lights on each side and a red blinking light in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
1.	where were you and what were you doing at the time?

playing catch with a neighborhood friend.

2.	what made you first notice the object? 

f14s were being scattered at miramar nava air station aka top gun. i mentioned to my friend i wonder what was going on at the base. this went on for about an hour prior to the sighting. at 7:15 an orange object shaped like a medicine wheel with six spokes caught my eye .


3.	what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? 
 
immediately i told my friend to look up and look at it. by the time he looked up the object was gone. but, we started joking about the object hoping it would land in school and disintegrate it. after 45 minutes of joking around, the jets were still being scattered and the object caught my eye again and this time my friend also saw it. 

4.	describe the object and its actions and motions?

this object was bright neon orange. it was three dimensional with six spokes. it was not spinning, or did it have any air traffic control lights. if you held a half-dollar up to the object it would block it out. there was no sound and no tail, just a solid object that you could see the night sky through the spokes.

5.	describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object?

we were kids and joking about it. but after seeing it the second time we ran and told our parents, who also joked about it. my dad said i had too much root beer, and my friend���s dad, who worked at lockheed, said it was marsh gas (in san diego?) 

6.	how did you lose sight of the object?

it moved from a east to west movement and disappeared over the horizon. the second fly over happened in 45 minutes, as soon as i saw the object again, i looked at my skin diving watch to verify the time. 

i am a nasa engineer and this sighting motivated my into physics and working with nasa. i can provide verification of my nasa employment.
content.summary: This object was bright neon orange. it was three dimensional with six spokes. it was not spinning, or did it have any air traffic control lights. if you held a half-dollar up to the object it would block it out.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of the 1st of august we where at my brothers house on rockhill road mountsorrel leicestershire having a family bbq at approximately 10.30 /22.30 hundred hours we all spoted a round orb shaped light in the sky we all thought is was a meterite but it was soon followed by another of the same shape and size at what seemed to be a 45 degree angle between them ,as thay passed a plane seamed to cross ther path and was above them so putting them at about a thousend feet . a few second,s later two more in the same formation and then a four formation a few seconds later and then the formation repeated them selfs two two formations and then a four ,and then a single orb on it own much brighter and moving a higher speed seemed to be in the the rear of the formation and on a centre line to the others . the orbs all heading in the same direction and not one broke formation and they all faded into cload at the same time .There was no wind at the time and no rain but after they passed it started to rain heavy as the last large orb went out of sight to the east in the direction of loughborough leicestershire ,i found this sighting very strange as there was no noise and each orb was moving at a set speed and was not floating because they all seemed to keep perfect time and did not seem at the mearsy of the elements . this was all recorded on video and on looking at the recording on close up the orbs seemed like golf balls with flatened tops. 

i dont beleve in little green men but this i have never seen before and was told that it was chinese latterns with i dont beleave as the direction they came is wooded and i have never seen laterns in mountsorrel in 30 years nor has my parents ,i dont have a answer i just know this was no aircraft i know and thought you might be interested as it fit the pattern of resent sighting around the uk.

thanks for lisening< pete harrison  (my brother has footed that i will obtain and send to u >
content.summary: 10-20 orbs in 2,2 formation and a 4 formation

content.detailedDescription:
We saw what we first thought was a hot air balloon on fire in the skies just east of raf st athan and cardiff wales int airport over wenvoe, as we watched it it looked like something on fire and was fairly motionless,our initial thought was that it was a hot air balloon flaring up or on fire. the object then started moving at a fairly fast pace (like an aeroplanes speed) from west to east over cardiff. as we watched it we discussed what it could be. it wasn't a balloon as it was moving to fast, and was traveling along a horizontal plane. we thought it couldn't be a plane or something on fire as it it wasn't losing any height . we watched the object for about 5 minutes as it disappeared into cloud to the east. all the time it flared bright orange, like it was on fire, and kept a constant speed(about that of a commercial airliner)and trajectory until it disappeared into cloud cover.

we discussed what we had seen during the evening and checked on the internet when we returned home to see if any planes had been reported crashed.

on googling "fireball cardiff" we were astounded to find reports of the south wales police reporting a similar incidence a month earlier.

this matter was reported to south wales police in august 2nd 2008
content.summary: Fireball

content.detailedDescription:
April 11th 2008. about 10:00pm to after 11:00pm. location was within 250 miles from south to west of stephenville, texas. this light would sometimes dim down somewhat and then become very bright. attempted to "signal"  this light with an 18 v flashlight and it seemed to get brighter in response. it made my son nervous and he asked me to stop. 
took two photographs with standard lens and what was surprising is that it photographed out green instead of white and changed it's shape drastically. photos were 15 seconds apart. it appeared to be about 3 to 5 miles away, but very difficult to determine distance. it was low over the hills and i am sure it was not picked up on radar as no planes intercepted it. the first photo showed a green ball shaped object. however, the second photo showed it to be flat. as this was extrodinary, it was nothing compared to the second sighting one month later on about the same date, may 10th 2008. this light was in same location the second time. i used a 4 power zoom lens. what i saw made me fall out of my chair. this object seemed to be a combination of a "thing" and a machine. some sort of exploratory craft. however, the position of it's head was 180 deg. away from me but the second photo showed that it had moved much closer towards me and was "looking? at me. this second photo was shot about 10 seconds later. when i look at these photos it makes my skin crawl. i tried to drive up to where i thought it might be, but turned around and came back with some sense of dread. 

i showed these last two photos to three engineers in my professsion behind closed doors in their conference room and they were at a complete loss to explain it. 
they asked that i not release them on the web and to further investigate on my own with a video showing the changes. i am very reluctant to show them to anyone at this time as it may be posssible that i will go up there on august 11th or so and maybe get better photos. i son't want this area to be overrun with a bunch of ufo nuts. although i don't see how they could be better except for video. 

i may release them later, but am not sure at this time. i do not want any recognition or any thing else for them. i just want to know what it is.

i discussed this sighting with a law enforcement officer and he informed me that that was a very desolate area.

i am not using my real name. just call me bart.
content.summary: A very bright white light with great lumonosity that bobbled but stayed in same location for over one hour.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony with a friend of mine when when we noticed a plane that was departing ohare airport in chicago with two circular orange lights chasing it from behind. i pointed it out to my friend and he claimed it was fireworks, but fireworks cannot reach that high and chase planes. the lights were making the plane look small, and the color of these lights looked like a sunset. they were not blinking, and they were off angle one from another. in a slant position. as the plane maintained it easterly course, the lights dimmed out and changed directions to the south. i prayed for it to come back so i could recorded it, i went and got my digital camera and waited for it to return. about 20 minutes later what appeared to be another ufo appeared in the sky almost directly above my position. this one seemed alot smaller and more distant then the first.

the lights were blinking in a pattern i have never seen before on any plane. it appeared to have no noticeable wings and was moving very slow and silent. i recorded 1 minute and 16 seconds of this ufo. i would share it with the world but i am embarrassed of the way i was talking while recording the phenomenon. i was to excited and got carried away with my language. ever since these two sitings, everytime i step outside my house on the balcony or through my front door. i am always looking for it and hoping it returns for me. i believe so much that it was a ufo that i purchased a camcorder equipped with nightvision and 25 times optical zoom so i can get a real good close up of the object next time it comes. if it ever comes back. i really hope it does. i am a true believer now that i have seen it with my own eyes, i always believed they existed, but now...I seen it with my own eyes. i truly hope it comes back. if anyone at this contact center wants to see this footage that i have please contact me directly. i left my information available. thank you in advance.
content.summary: Ufo blinking in flight path of planes

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home on the west side of bend and noticed very bright red and green (side by side) flashing lights. i thought it was a twinkling star at first but noticed that the red and green lights were very bright. i could not make out the shape because it was over the cascade mountain range. i had noticed it right below the big dipper. the one thing that caught my attention was that i noticed the object was heading away in a northwest direction, but the lights were pointed in my directions. i do not think that airplane lights are lit backwards?????? 1 minute after the object faded, a plane was heading west around the same area and the lights were completely recognizable for being a plane, but the object red and green lights were nothing i had ever seen before. if i was to guess the distance of the object from my position, the closest i would have to say was around 50 miles in a northwest direction, because i am actually guestamating the distance from were i live in bend to the cascade mountain range were the object was flying to. one of the volcanoes that are in that directions is mount jefferson.
content.summary: Red and green flashing object......Could not see shape was too far...

content.detailedDescription:
This was the first ufo i have seen. it was late at night, around 10:30 pm and i went into by backyard and looked up at the stars. i immediately noticed the big dipper and two stars to the left of it. later, i looked in my star map and found that the star in question should not have been there. as i noticed there were two bright stars on my left, above a tree behind my house, the one on the right started to move (as indicated in the .Bmp i provided). it moved to the right, up, then down, and started to fade away as if it were moving away from earth. i squinted and could see the light moving upward and getting fainter until it was gone.

i looked at the star-map and found that the star beside it (which it looked identical to) was a star, while the object in question should not have been there.

i have seen many planes in the sky at night as well as helicopters and none of them moved like this. i have also seen satellites and they are faint and move in a straight line. this moved in a zig-zag like pattern, started bright as if it were one of the brightest stars in the sky, and then as it moved it faded away as if it were moving away from me.
content.summary: Star moving and disappearing upwards
